artist: Wenceslaus Hollar; After a follower of Hans Holbein the Younger
creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: Jesus kneeling at center under crucifix; man at L crouching and leaning against the crucifix, while another at UR leans on the top of it; others in background watching, some with raised staffs
marks:
Inscription

bottom, in print: Christ beares his
title: Christ Carrying the Cross
